comment._content: Bostock & Wombwell's Menagerie on the road. The elephant is pulling one of the trucks, behind it you can just make out one of the camels which is assisting.

comment._content: Very likely Bostock & Wombwell's Menagerie on the Great North Road, Tyneside 1913
